name: Omnidirectional Rocket Horse (AnarchyGames)
description:
A physics sandbox rocket building  game created for Butterscotch Shenanijam 2017.

Three brave rocketeers desperately want their space mission to succeed, but it seems NASA has closed their doors (for obvious reasons, we think). Now they need your help to break into NASA Headquarters by using one of history's most successful horse based tactics - the Trojan Horse. Thus was born the OMNIDIRECTIONAL ROCKET HORSE (tm)

Music used: "Night of Fire", theme to Initial D.
